original_text: He was a burning and shining lamp, and you were willing to rejoice for a while in his light.
korean_text: 요한은 켜서 비추이는 등불이라 너희가 한때 그 빛에 즐거이 있기를 원하였거니와

sentences.original_text: He was a burning and shining lamp
and you were willing to rejoice for a while in his light.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그의 빛으로 잠시 기뻐하기를 원했습니다.
